title: Perform Continuous Auditing
description: An auditor sets up an automated script to continuously monitor transactions for potential exceptions.

tasks.description: Develop and schedule an automated script that runs weekly to check for purchase orders that were approved after the invoice was received.
tasks.expected_outcome: An automated monitoring script is created and scheduled.

tasks.description: Review the weekly output from the script.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor receives a weekly report of any exceptions.

tasks.description: When the script identifies a significant number of exceptions, launch a full investigation or audit of the process.
tasks.expected_outcome: The continuous monitoring results are used to trigger a targeted audit.
